alert.note: Alert for Southern Seward Peninsula Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 05 at 2:34PM AKDT until November 06 at 4:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM AKDT THIS EVENING TO 3 PM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Southern Seward Peninsula Coast. * WHEN...From 10 PM AKDT this evening to 3 PM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility down to one half mile or less at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Elevated surf is expected Saturday night and Sunday. This may cause minor beach erosion. Rain may mix with snow Sunday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
